name: Pumpkin Hill
description:
Use WASD or the arrow keys to navigate the map, and use the mouse to aim. Your goal is to collect enough glowing pumpkins or shoot enough glowing zombie hands to win! You need a combined 13 to beat the game. 

Besides those objectives, you can also have fun in the little sandbox and interact with the various colliders. Some objects aren't glued to the ground and with a little motivation from your left click, they will fly.

Things I'd like to improve upon: more consistent lighting, better and more filled out levels, and utilize mechanics like alternate firing.
